summary: I always thought Farengar hid behind his hood too much, possibly because of those hideous side burns. I aimed to change that, now I think he look fresh... He'll get all the warlocks.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Courier New][color=#000000][size=5]Better FarengarÂ 

[/size][/color][/font]I always hated the way Farengar looked, so I made him better. And got rid of that damn hood, lookin' like a insecure stalker... I made him so he looks a little bit nicer and I changed some of his attributes like his weight and his face. He always looked like a skinny person needing to take a dump.

He doesn't require any other mods, this is really simple. I didn't want to put my life and soul, because when you do that, it ends up looking like a barbie in Skyrim.
author: FaasnuDovahDuckah
